div.div:
chore(ytdlp): change to use POT provider yt-dlp
- Update the documented ENTRYPOINT to use a shell wrapper that launches the Node app before yt-dlp - Prepend `node /app/build/main.js &` to the yt-dlp command in the cookie‐copy hack so the main.js runs alongside downloads
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

ci: fetch and use latest yt-dlp tag in Docker build
- Add a workflow step that fetches the latest yt-dlp release tag via GitHub’s API and exposes it as an environment variable - Replace the hardcoded VERSION build-arg with the dynamically retrieved $VERSION for the Docker build
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

ci: fetch and use latest yt-dlp tag in Docker build
- Add a workflow step that fetches the latest yt-dlp release tag via GitHub’s API and exposes it as an environment variable - Replace the hardcoded VERSION build-arg with the dynamically retrieved $VERSION for the Docker build
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

ci: migrate workflows to Docker Hub and remove Quay
- Add a DOCKERHUB_ORGANIZATION_NAME input to the reusable docker setup action, drop QUAY_USERNAME/TOKEN, remove quay.io from the image list, and delete the Quay login step - Delete the entire docker_publish.yml workflow and its multi‐tag build/publish jobs - In docker_publish_latest.yml, rename the job to docker-pot, include DOCKERHUB_ORGANIZATION_NAME, switch the build file to pot.Dockerfile, remove registry cache settings, and drop Quay attestations
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

feat: add POT provider support for enhanced YouTube bot detection bypass (#3)
## 概要
這個 PR 加入了 POT (Proof of Origin Token) provider 支援，用於解決 YouTube 的機器人檢測問題。當使用者遇到 HTTP 403 錯誤或「確認您不是機器人」訊息時，POT provider 可以自動產生原始證明憑證，讓 yt-dlp 請求看起來更像是來自合法的瀏覽器。
## 主要變更
###
新功能 - **新增 POT provider Docker 變體**：基於 `brainicism/bgutil-ytdlp-pot-provider` 建立新的 `pot.Dockerfile` - **自動憑證產生**：整合 [bgutil-ytdlp-pot-provider](https://github.com/Brainicism/bgutil-ytdlp-pot-provider) 來自動處理 POT 憑證 - **多架構支援**：支援 `linux/amd64` 和 `linux/arm64` 平台
###
基礎建設改進 - **CI/CD 整合**：新增 `docker-pot` 工作流程以自動建構和發布 POT 變體 - **安全掃描**：為 POT 映像檔加入 Trivy 漏洞掃描 - **映像檔證明**：為所有容器登錄表加入建構證明
###
文件更新 - **README 更新**：加入 POT provider 的詳細說明和使用指南 - **建構指令**：更新建構指令範例，包含 POT provider 變體 - **使用案例說明**：解釋何時和為何使用 POT provider
###
版本更新 - 將所有 Dockerfile 中的 yt-dlp 版本統一更新至 `2025.06.30`
## 技術細節
### POT Provider 架構 - 使用 `brainicism/bgutil-ytdlp-pot-provider:1.1.0` 作為基礎映像檔 - 在背景執行 Node.js POT 服務 - 使用 `dumb-init` 作為 PID 1 來正確處理訊號 - yt-dlp 在前景執行，POT 服務在背景提供憑證
### 檔案變更摘要 - 新增 `pot.Dockerfile` - POT provider 變體的 Dockerfile - 更新 `.github/workflows/docker_publish.yml` - 加入 POT 映像檔建構工作流程 - 更新 `.github/workflows/scan.yml` - 加入 POT 映像檔安全掃描 - 更新 `README.md` - 加入 POT provider 文件和使用指南 - 更新所有 Dockerfile 版本號至 `2025.06.30`
## 使用方式
```bash # 標準用法 docker run -it -v ".:/download" ghcr.io/jim60105/yt-dlp:pot [OPTIONS] [--] URL [URL...]
# 建構本地映像檔 docker build --build-arg BUILD_VERSION=2025.06.30 --build-arg POT_PROVIDER_VERSION=1.1.0 -f ./pot.Dockerfile -t yt-dlp:pot . ```
## 測試
-
本地建構測試通過 -
多架構建構支援 -
CI/CD 工作流程驗證 -
安全掃描整合
## 注意事項
> **警告**: 提供 PO 憑證並不保證能繞過 403 錯誤或機器人檢查，但可能有助於讓流量看起來更像是來自合法的客戶端。
POT provider 作為容器內的背景服務執行，會在需要時自動向 yt-dlp 提供憑證，無需額外設定。
## 相關連結
- [bgutil-ytdlp-pot-provider](https://github.com/Brainicism/bgutil-ytdlp-pot-provider) - [yt-dlp POT 相關討論](https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/issues)
---
這個 PR 為經常遇到 YouTube 機器人檢測問題的使用者提供了一個新的解決方案，同時保持與現有 Docker 映像檔變體的一致性和相容性。

build: bump VERSION to 2025.06.30 in all Dockerfiles
- Bump the VERSION build argument from 2024.11.04 to 2025.06.30 across all Dockerfiles.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

feat(pot): pin yt-dlp version for reproducible builds
- Update the VERSION build argument to a specific date (2025.06.30) and modify the yt-dlp download URL to use this VERSION for reproducible builds.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

docs(readme): add usage and details for POT provider Dockerfile
- Update the README to add details about the new POT provider Dockerfile variant, including its purpose, usage, build arguments, and how it helps bypass YouTube's bot detection, along with updating build instructions, Dockerfile count, and relevant version numbers.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

ci: publish pot image and scan for vulnerabilities
- Introduce a new docker-pot job in the publish workflow that checks out code (with submodules), reuses setup steps for Docker/Quay credentials, builds and pushes a pot-tagged multi-arch image from pot.Dockerfile with registry caching, SBOM and provenance, and then adds attestations for GHCR, DockerHub and Quay - Add a Trivy scan step for the pot image in the security scan workflow to generate a vulnerability report (critical/high)
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

feat: provide bgutil-ytdlp in lean Docker image
- Extend VSCode spell-checker dictionary by adding “bgutil” and “ytdlp” and fixing the trailing comma after “Trivy” - Introduce a new multi-stage Dockerfile that downloads and unpacks the bgutil-ytdlp-pot-provider, then builds a final image from its base, creating a dedicated user and setting directory permissions - In the final image, copy licenses, static ffmpeg/ffprobe and dumb-init binaries, install the latest yt-dlp, and configure the entrypoint to launch the provider node script in the background alongside yt-dlp with proper signal handling
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>
